arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Lille – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma and Lille lock horns in the UEFA Europa League on Wednesday evening. The two sides are meeting in competitive action for the first time ever. Roma have only suffered defeat twice in 12 encounters with French opposition, while Lille have lost only three of their 12 games against Italian sides. arts.ttl: Roma Take an Interest in Lille and Arsenal Wingers
arts.sum: Roma wanted to sign another speedy attacker in the summer but wasted too much time pursuing Jadon Sancho and didn’t have a proper fallback plan. They’ll try again in January, provided the price is right. They are eying Arnar Haraldsson, Leandro Trossard, and Myron Boadu in particular. The post Roma Take an Interest in Lille and Arsenal Wingers appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
